StickerSlider.name: Sticker
StickerSlider.description:
Choose a sticker from here. Stickers include:
0: Fully transparent sticker (visually a softtoggle).
1:Essex.
2: Sleepy Kanna.
3: Kanna.
4: Mai.
5: Ram.
6:Rem.
7: Rias.
8: Ryuko.
9: Yuno.
10: Custom image named <cl>custom.png</c>. Nothing too large, please. It's for your own good.
